params._governanceTokenLockDate: New lock date of governance token.

params.newPrice: New price of governance token of USD (6 decimal)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

GovernanceTokenLockDateChanged(uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an governance token lock date changed.

GovernanceTokenPriceChanged(uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an governance token price changed.

InvestTokenAllowed(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an invest token allowed.

InvestTokenDenied(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an invest token denied.

Invested(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: An event thats emitted when an invested token.

PauserChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an pauser address changed.

UniswapRouterChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an uniswap router contract address changed.

Withdrawal(address,address,uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an withdrawal token.

allowToken(address).notice: Add token to investable tokens white list

denyToken(address).notice: Remove token from investable tokens white list

pauser().notice: Address that can pause a contract.
